page.title: 19FRISKNEY SCHOOL P.T.A.
page.content: The Parent Teacher Association consists of a group of interested parents and teachers . The committee is chaired by the Headteacher Mrs. Patman. Their aim is fund raising with a view to buy items for the school which are no longer available through the County Council because of financial cutbacks. These items are chosen by the staff and Head. In the year 1984/85 the P.T.A. purchased another computer, a xylophone, football shirts, netball bibs, music stands as well as paying the T.V. insurance. There are social events and talks. We hope these will encourage parents who are not very keen on committees, organising etc. to participate in school life and benefit the children's education.
